citation: Deepadung, Sujaritlak; Buakaw, Supakit; and Rattanapitak, Ampica (2015): A lexical comparison of the Palaung dialects spoken in China, Myanmar, and Thailand. Mon-Khmer Studies 44. 19-38.
title: CLDF dataset derived from Deepadung et al.'s "Lexical Comparison of Palaung Dialects" from 2015
